actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1068.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 11504.  A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, provide an economic emergency loan program to farmers and ranchers in the United States, and extend the Emergency Livestock Credit Act.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11504 (Consolidated farm and rural development).

titles.title: Resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 11504.  A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, provide an economic emergency loan program to farmers and ranchers in the United States, and extend the Emergency Livestock Credit Act.
